item.tag: timex["DURATION_SECONDS"]=Sum(Sum(Mult(timex["t_val1"], timex["t_unit1"]), Mult(timex["t_val2"], timex["t_unit2"])), Mult(timex["t_val3"], Normalize("#normDurationUnit", value)));

rule.example: 2 days and 4 hours, 3 minutes and 47 seconds

item.tag: timex["DURATION_SECONDS"]=Sum(Sum(Sum(Mult(timex["t_val1"], timex["t_unit1"]), Mult(timex["t_val2"], timex["t_unit2"])), Mult(timex["t_val3"], timex["t_unit3"])), Mult(timex["t_val4"], Normalize("#normDurationUnit", value)));

rule.example: on the first day of every month
